entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
